root.name: BoBo
root.description: StoryThe game BoBo is based on the Frano-Belgian comic strip by Paul Deliège and Maurice Rosy. The series follows the antics of BoBo who is serving a prison term of seventeen years for having stolen and a bike and is constantly attempting to break out of prison. The computer game requires players to experience BoBo’s everyday life in the prison b performing his everyday chores.GameplayThe gameplay of BoBo is comprised of six stages where the player is task with trying to obtain the highest score possible. There are no goals or objectives to accomplish instead all of the minigames have a set amount of time for the player.The six minigames are: serving soup, peeling potatoes, helping fellow inmates escape, climbing electrical wires to escape, and singing to fellow inmates to stop their snoring.
